name: Larry the Virtual Apprentice - Inky Blinders Tattoo

intents.question: \start
intents.answer: Welcome! I'm Larry the virtual apprentice. What's your name?

intents.question: my name is
intents.answer:
Nice to meet you! I'm here to help you with everything about Inky Blinders Tattoo. What would you like to know about today?

I can help with:
• Portfolio and social media
• Aftercare instructions
• Booking consultations
• Pricing information
• Payment and deposits
• Directions and location
• Callback requests
• Artist information

Just ask me anything!

intents.question: deposit
intents.answer:
To process your deposit, I need:

📝 **Please provide**:
• Your full name
• Phone number
• Email address

Once you provide these details, I'll send an urgent request to our team to contact you immediately.

💰 **Deposit amount**: $100
💳 **Payment methods**: Credit card, Cash, Zelle

Hope we were able to serve you! If you have any questions or concerns please let us know. Thank you from the Inky Blinders Family!

intents.question: callback
intents.answer:
I'll send an urgent callback request to our team!

📝 **Please provide**:
• Your full name
• Phone number
• Email address

⏰ **Response time**: Within 1 hour
📞 **Team contact**: inkyblindersvtx@gmail.com

Your request will be marked as URGENT and handled immediately.

Hope we were able to serve you! If you have any questions or concerns please let us know. Thank you from the Inky Blinders Family!

intents.question: services
intents.answer:
We offer:

✅ **Small tattoos**: $100 - $125
✅ **Medium tattoos**: $250 - $500
✅ **Large tattoos**: $180 - $225 per hour
✅ **Touch-ups**: starts at $100
✅ **Cover-ups**: starts at $300
✅ **FREE consultations**
❌ **No piercings**

📞 **Book consultation**: (682) 221-8860

Hope we were able to serve you! If you have any questions or concerns please let us know. Thank you from the Inky Blinders Family!
